sense.def:
To calculate a number or amount
pomeni preračunati neko število ali znesek.

seg.quote: The number of votes cast will then be calculated.

sense.def:
To calculate the effects of something
pomeni premisliti, kakšen bo učinek nečesa.

seg.quote: ...actions whose consequences can in no way be calculated.
She calculated that the risks were worth taking.

sense.def:
Če je nekaj
calculated
, da bi imelo določen učinek, je storjeno prav zaradi takega učinka.

seg.quote: ... a cool dignified attitude that was calculated to discourage familiarity.
